div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Implementation Guide for the eMedication in Switzerland.

description.value: Implementation Guide for the eMedication in Switzerland.

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

name.value: 1-1 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document

description.value: Example for Composition - Use case step 1-1: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the MTP document.
Example for MedicationStatement (MTP) - Use case step 1-1: The record of the medication Triatec, to be taken by Monika Wegmüller in the future.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 1-1: Decision for Triatec as medication treatment for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for Composition - Use case step 1-2: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the DIS document.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 1-2: Medication dispense of Triatec to Monika Wegmüller.

name.value: 1-2 Medication Dispense with Medication Beloc Zok

description.value: Example for MedicationDispense (DIS) - Use case step 2-4: The record of the supply of Beloc Zok.
Example for MedicationDispense (DIS) - Use case step 1-1: The record of the supply of Triatec.
Example for Composition - Use case step 2-1: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the LIST document.
Example for MedicationDispense (LIST) - Use case step 2-1: Entry in the dynamically generated medication list for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-1: Dynamically generated medication list for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for MedicationStatement (LIST) - Use case step 2-1: Entry in the dynamically generated medication list for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for Composition - Use case step 2-2: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the PADV document.
Example for Observation (PADV) - Use case step 2-2: Cancellation of Triatec due to undesired side effects.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-2: Cancellation of medication with Triatec due to undesired side effects of the active ingredient Ramipril.

name.value: 2-3 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document

description.value: Example for Composition - Use case step 2-3: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the MTP document.

name.value: 2-3 Medication Statement with Medication Beloc Zok

description.value: Example for MedicationStatement (MTP) - Use case step 2-3: The record of the medication Beloc Zok, to be taken by Monika Wegmüller in the future.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-3: Decistion for Beloc Zok as new medication treatment for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for Composition - Use case step 2-4: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the DIS document.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-4: Medication dispense of Beloc Zok to Monika Wegmüller.

name.value: 2-5 Composition for Medication Treatment Plan document

description.value: Example for Composition - Use case step 2-5: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the MTP document. The authors of the document are represented as person and device.
Example for MedicationStatement (MTP) - Use case step 2-5: The record of the medication Norvasc, to be taken by Monika Wegmüller in the future.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-5: Decistion for Norvasc as new medication treatment for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for Composition - Use case step 2-6: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the PRE document.
Example for Bundle - Use case 2-6: Prescription for Belok Zok for Monika Wegmüller.
Example for MedicationRequest (PRE) - Use case step 2-6: The order for the supply of Norvasc.

name.value: 2-6 PDF as original representation of the Medication Prescription document

description.value: Example for Binary - Use case step 2-6: Original representation (PDF) in the PRE document.
Example for Composition - Use case step 2-7: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the CARD document.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-7: Medication plan for Monika Wegmüller, created by her general practitioner. The 'fullUrl' elements of the entries and the references use absolute URLs.

name.value: 2-7 Medication Card document (with references/fullUrls as UUIDs)

description.value: Example for Bundle - Use case step 2-7: Medication plan for Monika Wegmüller, created by her general practitioner. The 'fullUrl' elements of the entries and the references use UUIDs.

name.value: 2-7 Medication Statement with Medication Beloc Zok

description.value: Example for MedicationStatement (CARD) - Use case step 2-7: The record of Beloc Zok as part of the current medication of Monika Wegmüller.
Example for MedicationStatement (CARD) - Use case step 2-7: The record of Norvasc as part of the current medication of Monika Wegmüller.

name.value: 2-7 PDF as original representation of the Medication Card document

description.value: Example for Binary - Use case step 2-7: Original representation (PDF) in the CARD document.
Example for Composition - Use case step 3-1: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the DIS document.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 3-1: Documentation of the medication administration of NaCl to Max Moser.
Example for Composition - Use case step 3-3: First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the DIS document.
Example for Bundle - Use case step 3-2: Documentation of the medication administration of Fentanyl to Max Moser.
Definition of the dosage (used in MedicationRequest)
Definition of the dosage (used in MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense)
Definition of the split dosage (used in MedicationStatement / MedicationDispense / MedicationRequest)
Extension to reference an external MedicationDispense/MedicationAdministration and the Medication Dispense document that contains it

name.value: CH EMED Extension Last Considered Document

description.value: Extension including the identifier of the last considered document for consolidating this MedicationStatement.
Extension to represent the changed MedicationRequest
Extension to represent the changed MedicationStatement
Extension to reference an external Observation and the Pharmaceutical Advice document that contains it
Extension to reference an external MedicationRequest and the Medication Prescription document that contains it
Extension to reference an external MedicationStatement and the Medication Treatment Plan document that contains it
Definition of the medication
Definition of the medication for the medication dispense
Definition of the composition for the medication card document
Definition of the bundle for the medication card document
Definition of the composition for the medication dispense document
Definition of the bundle for the medication dispense document
Definition of the composition for the medication list document
Definition of the bundle for the medication list document
Definition of the composition for the medication prescription document
Definition of the bundle for the medication prescription document

name.value: CH EMED Medication Treatment Plan Composition

description.value: Definition of the composition for the medication treatment plan document

name.value: CH EMED Medication Treatment Plan Document

description.value: Definition of the bundle for the medication treatment plan document
Definition of the medication administration for the medication dispense document
Definition of the medication administration for the medication list document
Definition of the medication dispense for the medication dispense document
Definition of the medication dispense for the medication list document
Definition of the medication request for the medication list document
Definition of the medication request for the medication prescription document
Definition of the changed medication request for the pharmaceutical advice document
Definition of the changed medication request for the medication list document
Definition of the medication statement for the medication treatment plan document (and as basis medication statement)
Definition of the medication statement for the medication card document
Definition of the medication statement for the medication list document
Definition of the changed medication statement for the pharmaceutical advice document
Definition of the changed medication statement for the medication list document
Definition of the observation for the medication list document
Definition of the observation for the pharmaceutical advice document
Definition of the organization for the eMedication context
Definition of the composition for the pharmaceutical advice document
Definition of the bundle for the pharmaceutical advice document
Definition of the practitioner for the eMedication context
Definition of the practitioner role for the eMedication context
Example for Composition - First entry (including header information, section(s) and references) in the PADV document with a dosage change.
Example for Device - A device as (one of the) author(s) of a document.
Example for Practitioner - Use case steps 1.x-2.x: General practitioner with a GLN.
Example for PractitionerRole - Use case steps 1.x-2.x: Representing the relationship between 'Familien Hausarzt' (practitioner) and 'Hausarzt' (organization).
Example for Organization - Use case steps 1.x-2.x: Organization with a GLN and the address.
Example for Patient - Use case steps 3.x: Male patient with a local patient identifier, date of birth and address.
Example for MedicationAdministration (DIS) - Use case step 3-2: The record of the administration (consumation) of Fentanyl.
Example for MedicationAdministration (DIS) - Use case step 3-1: The record of the administration (consumation) of NaCL.
Example for MedicationDispense (DIS) - Triatec with the explicit statement, that is was NOT substituted.
Example for MedicationDispense (DIS) - Triatec with the statement, that is was substituted.

Example for MedicationRequest - A new MedicationRequest with the new medication. It is referenced from Observation (PADV 'CHANGE') which includes the note to the change and it references the Observation itself.
Example for MedicationRequest - Order for the supply of Wallwurz Gel with a complex dosage (free text), as a reserve medication and without timing information.

name.value: Medication Statement with a medication in reserve and a maximum dosage

description.value: Example for MedicationStatment - Nitrostat with the dosage instruction: 'Take 1 tablet as needed for chest pain, maximum 3 tablets in 15 minutes'.

Example for MedicationStatment - A new MedicationStatement with the a new dosage. It is referenced from the Observation (PADV 'CHANGE') which includes the note to the change and it references the Observation itself.

name.value: Medication Statement with NOT recommended timing codes

description.value: Example for MedicationStatment - Norvasc with NOT recommended timing codes.
Example for Medication - Exforge with the two ingredients Amlodipine and Valsartan.
Example for Medication - NaraDex as a foreign product (non-Swiss) and therefore using the ATC code.
Example for Patient - Use case steps 1.x-2.x: Female patient with a local patient identifier, date of birth and address.
Example for Observation (PADV) - CHANGE with new MedicationStatement (change in dosage: 1 tablet in the morning instead of 0.5 tablet).
Example for Observation (PADV) - CHANGE with new MedicationRequest (generic medication: Amlodipine instead of Norvasc).

name.value: Pharmaceutical Advice document to change the dosage

description.value: Example for Bundle - Documentation of a dosage change (1 tablet in the morning instead of 0.5 tablet) for the medication Triatec.
Example for Practitioner - Use case steps 3.x: Paramedic with a GLN.
Example for PractitionerRole - Use case steps 3.x: Representing the relationship between 'Priska Huber' (practitioner) and 'Rettungsdienst' (organization).
Example for Organization - Use case steps 3.x: Organization with a GLN and the address.

name.value: Triatec with code not from VS

description.value: Example for Medication - Triatec with an ingredient code (SCT), which is NOT included in the SCT-VS which has an extensible binding.
Example for Medication - Triatec with the defined GTIN and a local medication code.
